original_text: I am very upset because my dear people have so much pain. I weep and I cry, as if a friend had died. I am very upset because my dear people have so much pain. I weep and I cry, as if a friend had died. I am very upset
korean_text: 딸 내 백성이 상하였으므로 나도 상하여 슬퍼하며 놀라움에 잡혔도다

sentences.original_text: because my dear people have so much pain
sentences.korean_translation: 나의 사랑하는 사람들이 너무 많은 고통을 겪고 있기 때문입니다

sentences.original_text: as if a friend had died
